summary: This document outlines a security and clearing operation plan for Little Saint James Island, scheduled for August 12, 2019. It details the division of the island into four zones, each assigned to a team responsible for securing structures and documenting their locations.

events.title: Security Operation on Little Saint James
events.description: Clearing teams are scheduled to arrive on Little Saint James Island to secure and clear the property, dividing it into four zones for systematic documentation of structures.

locations: North West Tip of the Island (dock location)
keyFacts: A planned security and clearing operation for Little Saint James Island was scheduled for August 12, 2019.
The island was to be divided into four zones, each assigned to a dedicated clearing team.
Team leaders were responsible for labeling and documenting the location of each structure on the island.
The operation appears to be part of post-arrest investigative activities following Jeffrey Epstein's arrest in July 2019.
